net.cellcloud.http

类 AbstractJSONHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cellcloud.http.HttpHandler
      • net.cellcloud.http.AbstractJSONHandler
  • 直接已知子类:
    HttpCheckHandler, HttpDialogueHandler, HttpHeartbeatHandler, HttpInterrogationHandler, HttpQuickHandler, HttpRequestHandler

    public abstract class AbstractJSONHandler
extends HttpHandler
    抽象层 JSON 格式 HTTP Handler 。
    作者:
    Jiangwei Xu
